text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Mount Somers | native_name = | native_name_lang = | settlement_type = Rural settlement | image_skyline = Mount Somers 727.JPG | image_alt = | image_caption = Mount Somers General Store | nickname = | image_map = | map_alt = | map_caption = | pushpin_map = | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_alt = | pushpin_map_caption = | coordinates = | coor_pinpoint = | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = New Zealand | subdivision_type1 = Region | subdivision_name1 = Canterbury | subdivision_type2 = Territorial authority | subdivision_name2 = Ashburton District | subdivision_type3 = Ward | subdivision_name3 = Western | established_title = | established_date = | founder = | seat_type = | seat = | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 2.60 | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 147 | population_as_of = 2018 Census | population_density_km2 = auto }} Mount Somers is a small town in the Ashburton District, New Zealand. It is located 40 kilometers west of Ashburton and is situated in the Southern Alps. It has a general store and a primary school that opened in 1876. == References == Category:Towns in Canterbury Region Category:Ashburton District
title: Mount Somers
